comment.author: 26808453@N03
comment._content:
I believe so, Renira1. Though we're not sure of their names, or who took the photograph. Would be interested to find out, if anyone has any information? 
-Emma

comment.author: 89245595@N04
comment._content: Interesting that the original title identifies them as a photographer and his staff-- you can see them posed with the equipment for their roles. The man at front right is the printer, with a contact frame. The young man at front left does tinting and/or retouching. The man seated at the table does admin and records, perhaps, with his ledger. Fascinating.
